title: Unveiling Her Innocence: Drive Me Wild - Novel Updates
tags: Adultery   Affair   Aggressive Characters   Arranged Marriage   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Bickering Couple   Blackmail   Cheats   Clingy Lover   Cohabitation   Contracts   Female Protagonist   S*x Friends   Twins   Unconditional Love   Unrequited Love
author: Fee YIP   叶菲
description:
She took her twin sister’s role and married with the man…

Although she concealed the true identity carefully, her new husband had already known everything…

Kabe-don? Bed-don? Why he’s so clingy after he saw through everything?!

“Hey! I’m not your real wife! Don’t come closer!”

“You are the one I married! Good girl, come here, let’s have a baby!”

The Adoring wife wanted to escape with her husband close behind, “Sweetie, please listen to me…”>
